title: Hackers Use Fake VPN and Browser NSIS Installers to Deliver Winos 4.0 Malware
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed a malware campaign that uses fake software installers masquerading as popular tools like LetsVPN and QQ Browser to deliver the Winos 4.0 framework.
The campaign, first detected by Rapid7 in February 2025, involves the use of a multi-stage, memory-resident loa
